attributes.background: WITH GLOBAL OIL PRICES IN CONSTANT DECLINE BETWEEN THE LAST TWELVE TO EIGHTEEN MONTHS, THEREBY PROMPTING PUMP PRICE REDUCTIONS IN DEVELOPED COUNTRIES- WITH AVERAGE PUMP PRICE AT £1 FOR 4.5L, WHEN WILL THE PEOPLE OF GREAT BRITAIN BEGIN TO SEE SIMILAR REDUCTION IN PRICE LIKE OTHER COUNTRIES?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The cost of fuel is the responsibility of individual petrol companies.

In relation to the price of petrol, the Government does have the power to raise and lower fuel duty. You could sign the following petition in relation to lowering fuel duty to European levels or lower https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104695.
